00024 namespace cwchess {
00025 
00026 inline Type MoveIterator::initial_type(Index const& index) const
00027 {
00028   Piece const& piece(M_chess_position->piece_at(index));
00029   if (piece != pawn)
00030     return nothing;
00031   return (index.row() == ((piece == white) ? 6 : 1)) ? queen : nothing;
00032 }
00033 
00034 inline MoveIterator::MoveIterator(ChessPosition const* chess_position, Index const& index) :
00035     M_chess_position(chess_position), M_targets(chess_position->moves(index)), M_current_move(index, get_first_bitindex(), initial_type(index)) { }
00036 
00037 } // namespace cwchess
